title: Smart Data Models - WasteObserved.
description: This entity models a single collection of Waste.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be WasteObserved

dateObserved.description: Property. Time of the wastecollection in ISO8601 UTCformat

weight.description: Property. The net weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ). For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram. Units: 'KGM'

grossWeight.description: Property. The gross weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ). For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram. Units: 'KGM'

tareWeight.description: Property. The tare weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ). For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram. Units: 'KGM'
